skills.name: Source Analysis
skills.description: Ability to distinguish, evaluate, and interpret primary and secondary historical sources

skills.name: Chronological Reasoning
skills.description: Understanding cause-effect relationships, continuity and change over time

skills.name: Contextualization
skills.description: Placing events and processes within broader historical contexts

skills.name: Comparison
skills.description: Analyzing similarities and differences across time periods, regions, and groups

skills.name: Argumentation
skills.description: Constructing evidence-based historical arguments and interpretations

skills.name: Data Literacy
skills.description: Interpreting quantitative historical data and creating data-driven arguments

HTS1.description: Identify and distinguish between primary and secondary sources

HTS2.description: Sequence events and identify basic cause-effect relationships

HTS3.description: Describe historical context of events in their time and place

HTS4.description: Compare basic similarities and differences across regions/groups

HTS5.description: Construct basic thesis statements with supporting evidence

HTS6.description: Read and interpret basic historical charts and data

HTS1.description: Evaluate source credibility, bias, and perspective

HTS2.description: Analyze continuity and change over time, identify turning points

HTS3.description: Connect historical context to contemporary issues

HTS4.description: Make evaluative comparisons across eras and movements

HTS6.description: Interpret quantitative data and create data-driven historical arguments
